Accessory Artisan Denign:
You want to learn about Fallen Angel's Accessory? Fallen Angels are known as the children of Gran Kain, the god of chaos. There was almost no research on them.
We only became aware of the Fallen Angels recently because the Fallen Angel's Accessory were discovered. We weren't able to find out how the power of the Fallen Angels came to be contained in accessories but the Wizards were able to create Scroll: Enchant Fallen Angel Accessory that could boost the Fallen Angel's power within.
Boosting the power of a Fallen Angel is a very difficult task. If you happen to have a Fallen Angel's Ring with +9 enchantment, I'll put it in a Treasure Chest for a special exchange.
